name: Roll for your life
description: The game is made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam and the theme is roll the dice. The game is about a evil species who have come to invade the forest of our hero. The master these species is a gambling addict and he lets his conquests choose their fate based on gambling or die. The game starts with player rolling the dice. As we all know that the opposite sides of a dice add up to 7, the game provides the player with ammo equal to the number on the top face of the dice and spawns enemies equal to the number on the opposite side.  Our hero has to face the odds given by the dice and survive to protect his home.
